opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Insituform Technologies, Inc. v. Cat Contracting, Inc.

opinion:
535 U.S. 1108

INSITUFORM TECHNOLOGIES, INC., ET AL.
v.
CAT CONTRACTING, INC., ET AL.

No. 00-1946.

Supreme Court of the United States.

June 3, 2002.

1

C. A. Fed. Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Festo Corp. v. Shoketsu Kinzoku Kogyo Kabushiki Co., ante, p. 722. Reported below: 10 Fed. Appx. 871.
